Description_lang: Empowers the caster, inflicting $373206s1 Cosmic damage to all players every $371447T1 sec.Upon removal this barrier manifests as one attackable enemy, casting a shared $371597s2 absorb shield with all other enemies for $371597D. A second unit manifests that also can be healed to reduce the shared shield.Upon expiration the barrier explodes, inflicting $371720s1 Cosmic damage and an additional $371720s2 Cosmic damage every $371720T2 sec. to all players for $371720D.If broken this effect backfires, inflicting all damage done to each enemy during the barrier as Cosmic damage, and additionally grants all players up to ${$371703s1+$371703s4}% increased damage done, ${$371703s2+$371703s4}% healing done, $371703s7% total health, and ${$371703s3+$371703s4}% increased absorbs done for $371703D.
AuraDescription_lang: $?$W2>0[Absorbs $w2 damage, shared between all hostile enemies with this aura.][]$?$W3>0[Absorbs $w3 healing, shared between all hostile enemies with this aura.][]Inflicts $371720s1 Cosmic damage and an additional $371720s2 Cosmic damage every $371720T2 sec. for $371720D to all players upon expiration.Infuses players with increased damage, healing, total health, and absorbs done if broken.
